statements: DELETE FROM legal_opinions WHERE expert_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM legal_opinions WHERE opinion_id = 1 AND publication_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM legal_opinions WHERE expert_name = 'John Doe' AND issue_title = 'Tax Law';
DELETE FROM expert_opinions WHERE expert_opinion_id = 100 AND author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM legal_commentaries WHERE date_commented < '2022-01-01' AND commentator = 'Jane Smith';
DELETE FROM comments WHERE commenter_name = 'John' AND comment_date < '2022-01-01';
